questions.question: What is the primary function of the aortic valve?
choices: Prevent backflow of blood into the left ventricle
Prevent backflow of blood into the right ventricle
Prevent backflow of blood into the left atrium
Prevent backflow of blood into the right atrium
questions.answer: Prevent backflow of blood into the left ventricle
